snippet: A sharp increase in renters is fueling a boom in apartment construction, while the homeownership rate in America is at a 20-year low.
abstract: Floyd Norris Off the Charts column notes Census Bureau report shows that homeownership rate continues to decline, as more Americans are preferring to rent; examines reasons why consumers are not lining up to buy homes.
lead_paragraph: A sharp increase in renters is fueling a boom in apartment construction, while the homeownership rate in America is at a 20-year low.

headline.print_headline: More Americans Are Preferring the Lease to the Mortgage
headline.main: More Americans Are Preferring the Lease to the Mortgage
